page.title: 05Kelfield, N. Yorkshire.
page.content: Kelfield is a quiet village of about 300. The children go to Riccall primary school until 11, then Barlby comprehensive until 16. 16+ can go to Selby Tertiary College & York College of Art and Technology College. The village institute is used for jumble sales, meetings and coffee mornings. The chapel has a small congregation. Churchgoers attend Stillingfleet church. The cricket club is in the York & district league.{ { A two-hourly York-Selby bus goes {through Kelfield. The nearest {railway station is Selby. There is no {shop. The Post Office is in a private {house with a daily letter collection. {Kelfield has one public house, The {Grey Horse, & one telephone box. { Two medical practices, Riccall & {Escrick, serve the village, which is {also visited by a district nurse.}
